Module slogo_team01
Package view

Interface BasicView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConfigurationView, Language, MovementView, StaticView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    View
    public interface BasicView
extends ConfigurationView, MovementView, StaticView, Language
    Allows for classes to implement this one interface and have methods from ConfigurationView, MovementView, StaticView and Language defined.
    Author:
    Goh Khian Wei, Ben Lawrence, Joshua Medway

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface view.ConfigurationView

        displayErrorMessage, updateCommandHistory, updateCustomVariables, updateUserCommands

      • Methods inherited from interface controller.interfaces.Language

        changeLanguage

      • Methods inherited from interface view.MovementView

        addLine, moveTurtle, rotateTurtle

      • Methods inherited from interface view.StaticView

        addTurtle, changeBackgroundColor, changePenColor, changeTurtleImage, clearScreen, hideTurtle, setPaletteIndex, setPenSize, showTurtle, updatePenUp
